alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin; Martin; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 9:03PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Powell, southwestern Martin, central Morgan, Johnson, northwestern Floyd, southern Menifee, northeastern Breathitt, Magoffin and Wolfe Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 903 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Martha to Wonnie to Adele to Calaboose. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winifred, Licksburg, Gifford, Flatgap, Elsie, Perlie, Gullett, Cyrus, Tella and Patton around 910 PM EDT. Salyersville, Mason, Chandlerville, Burning Fork, Seiltz, Stringtown, Sip, Puncheon, Ova and Galen around 915 PM EDT. Paintsville, Simpson, Fritz, Bradley, Ivyton, Hendricks, Eugene, Conley, Stambaugh and Nippa around 920 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Whitehouse, River, Foraker, Offutt, Chestnut, Gypsy, Taulbee, Marshallville, Riceville, Williamsport, Brainard, Carver Station, Carver, Tiptop, Wells Chapel, Conley Station, Boons Camp, Bonanza, Swampton, Sublett, Davisport, Dotson, Duco, Blue River, Rousseau, Cornelia, Gapville, Tomahawk, Cliff, Stidham, Inez, Ordway, Davella, Dock, Waldo, Guage, Camp Lewis, Delong, Fredville, Preece, Allen, Orchard, Prince, Beaver Junction, Pyramid, Dwale, Emma, Alvin, Andy and Corn Fork Hollow. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 43 and 76. Kentucky Highway 3 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 4. Kentucky Highway 3 in Johnson County Kentucky Highway 3 in Martin County between mile markers 1 and 9. Kentucky Highway 80 in Floyd County between mile markers 11 and 14. U.S. Highway 23 in Floyd County between mile markers 11 and 21. U.S. Highway 23 in Johnson County between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin; Martin; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe
